programme.title: Perils of the welfare state
programme.short_synopsis: Details of Ross Perot's plan to reduce the welfare state.
programme.medium_synopsis: The potential perils of a large welfare state and how one presidential candidate, Ross Perot, is proposing to reduce government spending, discussed by Alistair Cooke.
